blurb: Hey guys! I'm currently a Master's student studying Computer Science at Indiana University in Bloomington, IN. I love programming languages, systems and computer science pedagogy. In my freetime I enjoy playing tennis, hanging out with my [best friend](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dariana-chavez/) and messing around with code.
